Pre-Game Insights: The match between India and Bangladesh was scheduled for October 19, 2023, at the Maharashtra Cricket Association Stadium in Pune.
India had won their first three matches in the tournament, positioning them as strong contenders.
Rohit Sharma was in exceptional form, leading the batting order, while Jasprit Bumrah and Kuldeep Yadav were key bowlers.
Bangladesh had faced setbacks in their previous matches, making the upcoming game challenging for them.
